name: necon4i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wne(c2, c3), wn(wceq(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wne(c2, c3), wn(wceq(c0, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wne(c2, c3), wn(wceq(c0, c1)))
-| wi(wne(c2, c3), wne(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wne(c2, c3), wne(c0, c1))

comment: Contrapositive inference for inequality. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2007.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 24-Nov-2019.)
